symptoms.name: Vaginal discharge
symptoms.pattern: Green or yellow, sometimes frothy, fishy odor

symptoms.name: Irritation
symptoms.pattern: Present in many cases, vaginal redness and tenderness

symptoms.name: Painful intercourse
symptoms.pattern: May occur due to vaginal irritation

symptoms.name: Painful urination
symptoms.pattern: May occur if bladder is infected

physical_findings: Red blotches on vaginal wall or cervix

required: Symptoms suggestive of vaginal infection (e.g., unusual or persistent vaginal discharge, itching, irritation)
Microscopic examination of vaginal discharge revealing Trichomonas vaginalis
supportive: Physical examination findings (e.g., red blotches on vaginal wall or cervix, vaginal redness and tenderness)
History of sexual contact with infected partner
